metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28339 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: OpenDoas through 6.8.2, when TIOCSTI is available, allows privilege escalation because of sharing a terminal with the original session. NOTE: TIOCSTI is unavailable in OpenBSD 6.0 and later, and can be made unavailable in the Linux kernel 6.2 and later.

criterions.comment: opendoas package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
